Constructor Detail

Camera_Settings

public Camera_Settings(Controller_Computer ControllerComputer)
Method Detail

send_change_camera

public void send_change_camera(java.lang.String cameratype)
With this method you will be able to change the camera type between front and back. It is sending a typical signal to the Android device which will start the "Change command".

Parameters:
cameratype - Knows if it is the front or back camera

send_change_resolution

public void send_change_resolution(java.lang.String setting)
The second important part is to change the resolution of your camera. This is important for lowering your traffic and maybe your built-in camera is not able to send in the chosen resolution.

Parameters:
setting - Save the chosen Resolution by itemindex

send_switch_light

public void send_switch_light(java.lang.String cameralight)
At a dark night or twilight u need to switch on a light to see what is in front of your car. Sometimes it can be helpful to have an enlightened place.

Parameters:
cameralight - Variable for turning light on or off
